body.subject: Deployment unblocked - starting staged rollout
body.summary: Acknowledged Epic 28 implementation completion and quality approval. Updated deployment.json status to READY. All blocker requirements met. Starting staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitoring Prometheus metrics and structured logs during deployment.
key_points: Deployment.json updated: status changed from BLOCKED to READY
Quality approval received: release_gate: true, all quality gates passed
Implementation acknowledged: all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed, all tests passing
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production)
Monitoring ready: Prometheus metrics (god_agent_tasks_total, plan_duration_seconds, veto_total, skill_latency_seconds), structured logging
Rollback plans ready: safe rollback - all components stateless or use existing infrastructure
body.action_needed: Deployment proceeding with staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitoring metrics and health checks. Will report deployment status and any issues. If rollback triggers activated, will execute rollback plans. Deployment progress will be reported via structured messages.
